TEXT.S: Don Anielak nalecuhan i St. Louis, Missouri, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Don Anielak i 1954 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 26, namapili' tu nu New York Knicks putiput. 11 bulad 1 demiad, 1930 a mihca, Don Anielak, miunduay. (mapatay i 1995 a mihca)
